definition[0]: feeling that you want or need a drink
example[0]: Can I have a glass of water? I’m really thirsty.
example[1]: He’d been working in the garden and was very hot and thirsty.
example[2]: All this digging is thirsty work  (=work that makes you want a drink).
definition[1]: having a strong desire for something
definition[2]: fields or plants that are thirsty need water
